ThingDef.label: archotech spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial spine built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech heart
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial heart built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial stomach built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial kidney built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial liver built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial lung built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial jaw built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial brain built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial ear built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech nose
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial nose built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech pelvis
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial pelvis built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial rib built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech sternum
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial sternum built by archotech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech strong spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial spine built by archotech. It is incredibly strong and is optimized for carrying very heavy objects. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech flexible spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial spine built by archotech. It is incredibly flexible and allows for very complex movements. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech filter lung
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial lung built by archotech. It filters toxins from the air. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech detoxifier stomach
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial stomach built by archotech. It allows the user to eat almost anything without ever worrying about food poisoning. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech reprocessor stomach
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial stomach built by archotech. An advanced molecular processing system extracts energy from nutrients the body could normally never use, leading to significantly increased efficiency. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech filter kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial kidney built by archotech. It filters the blood, allowing faster recovery from illnesses. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech slow heart
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial heart built by archotech. It significantly slows down the blood flow while keeping the user healthy by manipulating the blood propagation, reducing stress on the vessels and bleeding rate. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech painkiller rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial rib built by archotech. It can release a very effective painkiller that has no side effects. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech immunized liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial liver built by archotech. It resists infections by scanning the blood for harmful bacteria and removing them, and makes additional factors that significantly enchance the immunity gain speed. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech analyzer ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial ear built by archotech. It contains an internal subpersona AI which helps analyze even hidden emotions in the voice and suggests the best behaviour pattern and properties of speech. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech hypno jaw
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial jaw built by archotech. It can generate any sound the user wants, and it can also generate an incredibly fine sound wave adjusted for neural network of the receiver, no matter if it is pawn or an animal, which makes the receiver more agreeable. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: archotech medical arm
ThingDef.description: An artifical arm built by an archotech. It is equipped with an internal neural network that optimizes medical operations. It is almost impossible to fail a medical operation with this arm. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.
